Reference

bitmexr

bitmexr

bitmexr: R Client for the BitMEX Exchange

Individual trade data

These function retrieve data regarding individual trades that have been executed on the exchange.

trades()

Trade data

map_trades()

Trade data over an extended period

Bucketed trade data

It is often convient to grouped individual trades together into “buckets” for a specified time interval. These functions return bucketed trade data for the follow intervals: 1-minute, 5-minutes, 1-hour, 1-day

bucket_trades()

Bucketed trade data

map_bucket_trades()

Bucket trade data over an extended period

Helpers

Helper functions

available_symbols()

Available symbols

valid_dates()

Start date of data availability for available symbols
